```{r}
#### creating a vector

length_class
```

```{r}
#### creating a list

class_list<- list(Member1= c("Mark",1.7),
                  Member2= c("Jeffery",1.75),
                  Member3=c("Linda",1.78),
                  Member4= c("Ross",1.8),
                  Meember5=c("Leo",1.9))

###Getting an item inside my list
class_list$Member1

###Getting the height of Mark

class_list[[1]][2]

### Getting the name of Member 1
class_list[[1]][1]

class_list

```

## Vector functions

```{r}

x <- c(iris2$Sepal.Length)

class(x)

# Return x sorted.
sort(x)

# Return x reversed.
rev(x)

# See counts of values.
table(x)

# See unique values.
unique(x)
```
